statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Kenya coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.50} per pound with some Breakfast coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.70} per pound to create \displaystyle{60} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${12.68} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
